name: Mundo the Apprentice
description:
A wizards apprentice gets sent to an unknown island by a witch after witnessing the theft of portal crystal.

Hello Everyone,

Here's the game that I've been working on for quite some time: 

"Mundo the Apprentice"

Press tab and one of the directional keys to change your current spell. With Z X C buttons being the rest. You use the amulet with C button but I think you can figure it out the rest, some of the fun lies there. Theres just one basic secret but there will be a lot more in the final game so have fun. And controller support is coming, it's just that I need a decent one.

It is still at the Alpha testing stage and missing most sound effects, some theme music etc; but I'm very proud of it so far.

I hope that you'll like it and share it with your friends.
And maybe you can give me feedback on issues or what you like/dislike about it.

I plan to publish it for PC/Mac as soon as I can. With Linux down on the line.

You can reach me at "tlomdev@gmail.com"
Please follow "@tlomdev" on twitter and instagram for future updates.

And most importantly share it.

I mean it.

Please share it!

I have a lot more art that I've drawn and yet to put in the game but if you like this so far you're going to love the upcoming stuff.

Best wishes.

Mac users please read.

Drag the demo in applications folder and paste this to terminal. 

Have fun.

xattr -c /Applications/mundo\ the\ apprentice\ -demo.app

open /Applications/mundo\ the\ apprentice\ -demo.app
